short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BRemover can modify how certain webs work given the rules by the user.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BRemover is an extension that can modify how a web works. You can add a domain and it will apply rules to it, the rules that can be applied are:
- Remove classes from a certain target.
- Add classes to a certain target
- Add css styles
- Remove nodes from the DOM
- Add scripts to the page
- Add script links to the page
- Add stylesheets to the page
